edge_1: In January 2016, Paramount Pictures scheduled Baywatch for a May 19, 2017 release, which was originally scheduled for a sequel to Terminator Genisys.
edge_2: Baywatch is a 2017 American action comedy film directed by Seth Gordon, with Mitch Buchannon as the lead character in this movie based on the television series of the same name.

edge_2: Principal photography on the film Baywatch began in Deerfield Beach, Florida.

edge_2: Baywatch was released on Digital HD on August 15, 2017.
